definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat

sentences.english: Historical materials of reclaim and cultivate in Kaiyuan and Mengzi district, Yunnan Province are mainly preserved in Yunnan Archives.
sentences.chinese: 雲南開蒙墾殖的史料主要保存在雲南省檔案館。

sentences.english: There are several reasons to doubt that 90% of our brains lie silent.
sentences.chinese: 有很多的理由來懷疑，我們大腦的90%都未開蒙。

sentences.english: Learning to read with pictures is an early education process that we are all familiar with.
sentences.chinese: 看圖識字是我們很多人熟悉的開蒙的過程。
